title: ID this font used by ICC
author: mohdumar

comments.content: This is Erik Spiekermann’s good ol’ [Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419034134/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_meta_ot_bold/ot_ps/specimen/tester/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=55&sample_text=IND%20v%20ENG%20338-8&ft=liga%2Clnum%2Cpnum) (Bold).
